question.text: You have just driven past this sign. You should be aware that

explanation.text: In a one-way system traffic may be passing you on either side. Always be aware of all traffic signs and understand their meaning. Look well ahead and react to them in good time.

answer.text: it is a single track road
you cannot stop on this road
there is only one lane in use
all traffic is going one way
